docs.text: Welcome to Sim-Utils Documenting wrappers for implementing a full AA->field theory workflow Contents We will cover: Creating a system Creating molecule structures Creating system structures and topologies Setting up a force field Getting started with OpenMM Coarse-Graining a System Converting a coarse-grained system into a field theory simulation Running field theory: constructing a phase diagram

docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage.
